SELECT goodsfacility_one.goodsfacility_one_code , goodsfacility_one.goodsfacility_one_name , goodsfacility_two.goodsfacility_two_code , goodsfacility_two.goodsfacility_two_name FROM goodsfacility_one, goodsfacility_two WHERE goodsfacility_one.goodsfacility_one_code=goodsfacility_two.goodsfacility_one_code ORDER BY goodsfacility_two_code DESC

SELECT goodsfacility_one.goodsfacility_one_code , goodsfacility_one.goodsfacility_one_name , goodsfacility_two.goodsfacility_two_code , goodsfacility_two.goodsfacility_two_name , goodsfacility_three.goodsfacility_three_code , goodsfacility_three.goodsfacility_three_name FROM goodsfacility_one, goodsfacility_two, goodsfacility_three WHERE goodsfacility_one.goodsfacility_one_code = goodsfacility_two.goodsfacility_one_code AND goodsfacility_two.goodsfacility_two_code=goodsfacility_three.goodsfacility_two_code ORDER BY goodsfacility_three_code DESC
